entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
